discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C - Activity stream is an example of a formatter

comments.content: Yeah, it is the only logical answer by process of elimination, but the phrasing of the question is totally confusing.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The wording is kinda confuzing..

questions.question_text: Which element is used to track items not saved with a field, in a record?

choices.A: Adjust your Transform maps, after the data is loaded into the target table.
choices.C: Create a new Import set table for each new data load.
choices.B: Use extremely large Import Sets, instead of multiple large Import Sets.
choices.E: Monitor data quality and clean imported data, using the Data Scrub Workspace.
choices.D: Plan time before your import to remove obsolete or inaccurate data.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D - listed in the CSA book Washington as good practice
D. Ensure that your import completes successfully and that the resulting data matches your expectations.

questions.question_text: What does ServiceNow recommend as a best practice regarding data imports?
When an administrator sets a policy that is applied to all data entered into the Platform (UI, Import Sets, or Web Services), where does this policy run by default?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Something that applies to data inputs via forms, integrations, etc must run on the server side.

questions.question_text: If a user is on an Incident form and is alerted when they change the value of the Priority field, which type of script executes in the Platform?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Key words "on a form"

Selected Answer: A
Answer: A - Server Script.

Selected Answer: A
Tags can help with categorizing a list of records and you can set visibility for the tags

questions.question_text: Which feature can be used to categorize a set of records from a list and make them visible to other users?
